entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
